playbook.name: Fabric creation
playbook.description: Fabric creation playbook. This playbook creates fabric from the host file.

guiProperties.tooltip: Enter Fabric Name
guiProperties.userAssistText: Starts with letter followed by letters, numbers, _, - and 59 characters limit.

guiProperties.tooltip: Enter Description

column.userAssistText: Allowed values: letters, numbers, ., - and 59 characters
Switch ip address

guiProperties.tooltip: Enter User Name
Enter Password
guiProperties.userAssistText: Maximum length of password will be 59

guiProperties.tooltip: Enter Password
Flag to toggle/convert 40g ports to 10g ports, Toggle 40g, boolean
Inband ips to be assigned to switches starting with this value, Inband IP
Select fabric network type
Select fabric control network
Specify subnet mask for mgmt-ip to be assigned to switches
Specify gateway-ip to be assigned to switches
Specify dns-ip to be assigned to switches
Specify dns-secondary-ip to be assigned to switches
Specify domain-name to be assigned to switches
guiProperties.userAssistText: Legal values: letters, numbers, ., - and 59 characters

guiProperties.tooltip: Specify ntp-server value to be assigned to switches
guiProperties.userAssistText: Legal values: letters, numbers, ., - and 59 characters

guiProperties.tooltip: Flag to enable STP at the end of configuration
Flag to enable/disable auto-trunk
Flag to enable/disable auto-neg for T2+ platforms
Select PN static setup
Select PN web api

playbook.name: Basic Fabric Creation
playbook.description: Fabric creation playbook. This playbook creates fabric from the host file.

guiProperties.tooltip: Enter Fabric Name
guiProperties.userAssistText: Starts with letter followed by letters, numbers, _, - and 59 characters limit.

guiProperties.tooltip: Enter Description

column.userAssistText: Allowed values: letters, numbers, ., - and 59 characters
Switch ip address

guiProperties.tooltip: Enter User Name
Enter Password
guiProperties.userAssistText: Maximum length of password will be 59

guiProperties.tooltip: Enter Password
Flag to indicate if port speed should be toggled for better topology visibility
guiProperties.userAssistText: Toggle port speed for better topology visibility

guiProperties.tooltip: Inband ips to be assigned to switches starting with this value, Inband IP
Specify dns-ip to be assigned to switches
Specify dns-secondary-ip to be assigned to switches
Specify domain-name to be assigned to switches
guiProperties.userAssistText: Legal values: letters, numbers, ., - and 59 characters

guiProperties.tooltip: Specify ntp-server value to be assigned to switches
guiProperties.userAssistText: Legal values: letters, numbers, ., - and 59 characters

guiProperties.tooltip: Flag to enable/disable auto-trunk
Flag to enable/disable auto-neg for T2+ platforms

playbook.name: L2 VRRP
playbook.description:
• Create trunk
  • Create VLAG
  • Create vRouter
  • Create VLANs
  • Cluster between spines
  • Create VRRP interfaces on spines
  • Supports leaf switches in cluster
  • Supports leaf switches not in cluster
  • Supports mix of leaf switches in cluster and not in cluster

guiProperties.tooltip: Flag to update fabric network to in-band
Flag to enable STP at the end of configuration
Layer2 VRRP data csv file

column.userAssistText: Enter Valid IP/SubnetMask.
VLAN ID must be between 2 to 4092.
Allowed values: letters, numbers, ., - and 59 characters

guiProperties.tooltip: Specify VRRP ID to be assigned
guiProperties.userAssistText: VRRP ID must be 32 bit positive number.

playbook.name: L3 VRRP EBGP
playbook.description:
• Create vRouter
  • Configure Layer 3 Link Address
  • Create Loopback IP and RouterID
  • Create EBGP Network
  • Create BFD Neighbor
  • Create VLANs
  • Create VRRP Interfaces for leaf clusters
  • Create SVI for Non-cluster leaf nodes
  • Supports leaf switches in cluster
  • Supports leaf switches not in cluster
  • Supports mix of leaf switches in cluster and not in cluster

guiProperties.tooltip: Csv file containing L3 VRRP data.

column.userAssistText: VLAN ID must be between 2 to 4092.
Enter Valid IP/SubnetMask.
Allowed values: letters, numbers, ., - and 59 characters
Allowed values: letters, numbers, ., - and 59 characters
VRRP ID must be 32 bit positive number.
Allowed values: letters, numbers, ., - and 59 characters

guiProperties.tooltip: Specify VRRP ID to be assigned
guiProperties.userAssistText: VRRP ID must be 32 bit positive number.

guiProperties.tooltip: Network address required to calculate link IPs for layer3 fabric.
CIDR count for creating L3 Links
guiProperties.userAssistText: Ipv4 CIDR to creating the interfaces for L3 links.

guiProperties.tooltip: Subnet mask required to calculate link IPs for layer3 fabric.
Loopback IP starting value for vrouters.
Flag to indicate if BFD config should be added to vrouter interfaces
BFD-MIN-RX value required for adding BFD configuration to vrouter interfaces.
guiProperties.userAssistText: BFD Min RX must be between 200 to 3000.

guiProperties.tooltip: BFD_MULTIPLIER value required for adding BFD configuration to vrouter interfaces.
guiProperties.userAssistText: BFD Multiplier must be between 1 to 20.

guiProperties.tooltip: Flag to indicate if fabric network should be updated to in-band.
Flag to enable STP (spanning tree protocol)
Ip range for creating the interfaces between leaf clusters.
Vlan for creating the interfaces between leaf clusters
CIDR count for bgp ip range
guiProperties.userAssistText: Ipv4 CIDR to creating the interfaces between leaf clusters.

guiProperties.tooltip: Variable to specify pim_ssm for EGP.
Ipv4 Subnet mask required to creating the interfaces between leaf clusters.
guiProperties.userAssistText: Ipv4 Subnet mask to calculate link IPs for layer3 fabric.

guiProperties.tooltip: Flag to assign mtu Default: False.
BGP-AS-RANGE value to be assigned to vrouters
guiProperties.userAssistText: BGP as range must be between 1 to 4294967295.

guiProperties.tooltip: BGP-MAXPATH value to be assigned to vrouters
guiProperties.userAssistText: BGP Maxpath must be 0 or between 1 to 255.

guiProperties.tooltip: Type of if_nat_realm. choices=['internal', 'external'], default='internal'
Variable to configure BGP redistribute

playbook.name: L3 VRRP OSPF
playbook.description:
• Create vRouter
  • Configure Layer 3 Link Address
  • Create Loopback IP and RouterID
  • Create OSPF Network
  • Create BFD Neighbor
  • Create VLANs
  • Create VRRP Interfaces for leaf clusters
  • Create SVI for Non-cluster leaf nodes

  • Supports leaf switches not in cluster
  • Supports mix of leaf switches in cluster and not in cluster

column.userAssistText: VLAN ID must be between 2 to 4092.
Enter Valid IP/SubnetMask.
Allowed values: letters, numbers, ., - and 59 characters
Allowed values: letters, numbers, ., - and 59 characters

guiProperties.userAssistText: BFD Multiplier must be between 1 to 20.

guiProperties.tooltip: Flag to indicate if fabric network should be updated to in-band.
Flag to enable STP (spanning tree protocol)
Area id to configure for OSPF

guiProperties.tooltip: Ip range for creating the interfaces between leaf clusters.
Vlan for creating the interfaces between leaf clusters
subnet count for iospf ip range

guiProperties.tooltip: ospf cost. Default: '10000'.
guiProperties.userAssistText: OSPF Cost must be between 1 to 65535

guiProperties.tooltip: Varible to configure area choices=['singlearea', 'dualarea'], default='singlearea'
Flag to assign mtu Default: False.
Type of if_nat_realm. choices=['internal', 'external'], default='internal'
